feed.title: Pintereso
feed.subtitle: Pintereso is a free Jekyll theme for awesome people like you, Pinterest like.

entry.title: Stellar Social Media Banner Pack
entry.content: 12 fully editable banner designs, each in 5 different sizes optimized for Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest and Blog adds and posts! Very easy to edit, with 100 stock photos included, this pack is an awesome way to create stunning and eye catching adds and posts.
entry.summary: 12 fully editable banner designs, each in 5 different sizes optimized for Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest and Blog adds and posts! Very easy to edit, with 100 stock photos included, this pack is an awesome way to create stunning and eye catching adds and posts.

entry.title: Intro UI Kit
entry.content: Intro is the modern and minimalistic UI Kit that will help you simplify your work. Perfect for creating websites of agencies, studios and creative people around the world.
entry.summary: Intro is the modern and minimalistic UI Kit that will help you simplify your work. Perfect for creating websites of agencies, studios and creative people around the world.

entry.title: Maltese
entry.content: Inside you’ll find 10 easy to edit, fully customisable Moodboard Templates, created in PHOTOSHOP and optimised in 2 different sizes for the best presentation on Pinterest, Instagram and not only.
entry.summary: Inside you’ll find 10 easy to edit, fully customisable Moodboard Templates, created in PHOTOSHOP and optimised in 2 different sizes for the best presentation on Pinterest, Instagram and not only.

entry.content: Aries is a Premium WordPress Themes for bloggers.

entry.title: Material Mobile UI Kit
entry.content: Matta - Material Design Mobile UI Kit is the superb library of app Templates and UI elements combined into high-quality source files for Sketch. All you need for quick prototype, design and develop any Material Design mobile app.
entry.summary: Matta - Material Design Mobile UI Kit is the superb library of app Templates and UI elements combined into high-quality source files for Sketch. All you need for quick prototype, design and develop any Material Design mobile app.

entry.title: Circular
entry.content: Circular is a pack of 5 beautiful, responsive and unique landing pages.
entry.summary: Circular is a pack of 5 beautiful, responsive and unique landing pages.

entry.title: Capi Restaurant
entry.content:
Capi Restaurant UI Kit is a high quality pack of 40+ social app screens based on iOS 11 which will accelerate your design process and will help develop an outstanding experience.

100% Vector Based, so all screens can be easily resized to fit other iPhone screens. Dimensions 375x812 and 375x667.
entry.summary: Capi Restaurant UI Kit is a high quality pack of 40+ social app screens based on iOS 11 which will accelerate your design process and will help develop an outstanding experience.

entry.title: Creation Web UI Kit
entry.content: The Creation Web UI kit is the largest library you could ever find. Designing using it will definitely be enjoyable as we have every elements you need for you to customize. Each is fully editable and pixel perfect. Additionally, we have created both light and dark blocks so that your design will be way easier than it was. It is definitely the tool you need in your collection!
entry.summary: The Creation Web UI kit is the largest library you could ever find. Designing using it will definitely be enjoyable as we have every elements you need for you to customize. Each is fully editable and pixel perfect. Additionally, we have created both light and dark blocks so that your design will be way easier than it was. It is definitely the tool you need in your collection!

entry.title: Dashboard Kit
entry.content: Photoshop massive collection of fully customizable UI components, closely related to each other and combined on different levels, regarding systematic design principles. Ultimate tool to start designing in system or boosting up your working process at any stage, from prototyping to stylization.
entry.summary: Photoshop massive collection of fully customizable UI components, closely related to each other and combined on different levels, regarding systematic design principles. Ultimate tool to start designing in system or boosting up your working process at any stage, from prototyping to stylization.
